channel.title: One does not simply achieve such things
channel.description:
Without fly hacking.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qdXnDprDwTI&feature=youtube_gdata
Need I post more, think this is enough proof? I went all CIA on them because 1 of them was banned for evasion, one for griefing, one for flying, pretty sure they're all just the same group of people that comes along every version and does stupid shit.
Now in 720P HD quality! Thumbs up!
Edit - LOL. Just been watching him fly around the map like a house fly, got some of it on video again from the world map will upload if the above isnt enough, he basically goes from normal speed to jumping hundreds of blocks over buildings.
EDIT - Admitted to cheating and so on, and also found he went against my warning and assisted an evader in evading my lieing to him. Banned.

item.title: One does not simply achieve such things
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Yeah, I can see it.

It’s complicated but he hangs around with about 6 people who consist mainly of ban evaders, I’m not even sure which one of them has done what now. They don’t even speak English. People like Girlman from the past are apart of them as well.

I’m going to go through all accounts linked to them tomorrow and sort it all out with them.

Read full topic
item.source: One does not simply achieve such things

item.title: One does not simply achieve such things
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Tom_BETA:

This guy is getting on my nerves, apart from that they also abuse residence, they’ve registered accounts resd areas then removed them from their profiles by the looks of it so it can’t be tracked, and also helped some guy ban evade by lieing to me.

I don’t know if you can see things like this:
http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php?action=profile;area=tracking;sa=edits;u=534954
But it tracks profile edits, and his minecraft name has never been changed.

Read full topic
item.source: One does not simply achieve such things

has he always been a problem?
